title: Exclusive Track Premiere: The Cyclist – Bending Brass
content:
There’s a wonderfully hypnotic vibe to The Cyclist’s music, a style which creates such a fantastic, transcendental feeling of euphoria. Technicolor! debuted a couple of months back summarises the exceptional talent this eighteen year old Northern Irish musician has, incorporating dubstep and dance influences to create a unique and enjoyable sound. His music is the product of a £20 keyboard, which brings up random errors and technical faults, causing his vibrant, trance-inducing tracks. With his debut full length release, Bending Brass, out on Crash Symbols later this month, we’re delighted to be able to exclusively premiere the title track from the record. Bending Brass is a more atmospheric, chilled out affair than previous tracks from The Cyclist, envisioning a lucid landscape, with it’s steady monotone-esque beat and it’s hazy keyboard effects. Both Bending Brass (available to download for free below) and Technicolor! serve as a welcome introduction to this young artist; make sure to check out and pre-order his full length release over at the links below.

The Cyclist – Bending Brass

Pre-order Bending Brass

Technilama by The Cyclist

Now you can let us know what you think, or ‘like’ the article to share it with your friends!
